snippet: The Washington Capitals keep picking up victories and points. The problem: So is just about everyone else in the brutal Metropolitan Division....
lead_paragraph: The Washington Capitals keep picking up victories and points. The problem: So is just about everyone else in the brutal Metropolitan Division.

headline.main: Oshie, Kuznetsov Help Capitals Beat Canes 4-3 in Shootout
